DOC.brief_summary: To study safety efficacy four different dos Wobenzym ( enzyme combination consist pancreatin , papain , bromelain , trypsin , lipase , amylase , chymotrypsin , rutin ) patient HIV infection whose CD4 count 250 400 cells/mm3 . To evaluate effect Wobenzym certain surrogate marker associate progression HIV disease .
DOC.brief_title: The Safety Four Different Dose Levels Wobenzym HIV-Positive Patients
